title: Migration
body: Good day. I recently migrated to Australia because of i have to continue on studying here. I was from the Philippines With diamond 2 rank and all Heroes owned and a bunch of skins owned. I just want to know if I can transfer my League of Legends Philippines to League of Legends Oceana. Because i really put a lot of effort in that account and spent 4years of playing using that account. Thank you!

replies.body:
Hey there,

Unfortunately Garena > Riot server transfers are no longer available.

Hey SephirothSG,

Cheers for confirming this information for Lucem101. Sorry Lucem101, but there is nothing we can do for now. Hopefully in the near future, Riot brings this service back :D. Wish you all the best for your study.

Kind Regards
Swhyper

Good day sir,

Hope you are enjoying your stay :D.

The Oceanic community is full of unique fun people :D. Anyways, let's focus on your questions. Please go onto this link as this link will explain everything http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/garena-oceania-transfers-faq#account1

Thanks
Swhyper

Sir the link http://garenatransfer.oce.leagueoflegends.com/transfer isn't working. The link that you gave to me there's an instruction from where i should click that link in order to apply. But an error this page isn't working appears whenever i click it.

Hmm true. The provided link on that page is also not working/accessible for me too..Because this announcement was made by a Oceanic Riot member, I would suggest you to go onto this link https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new and then submit a ticket. Hope this helped :D.

Full article on transfer are here > https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751924

Cheers
Swhyper
